verbs.description: [V: ing] thinks tory victory will damage britain because of its brexit vote promise the tories promised a referendum after pressure from anti - eu membership parties such as ukip james knightley nigel farage liberal democrats westminster uk independence party scottish national party eurobarometer european union carl court george osborne
